about.heading: Who's MP?
paragraphs: I'm a tech consultant based in Surrey, working with small businesses across the UK. I've spent years in enterprise tech — now I help smaller teams get the same results without the complexity (or the price tag).
I use modern tools (including AI) to work faster and smarter. That means quicker turnaround and better value for you.

finalCta.heading: Let's figure out what you actually need
finalCta.subheading: No pitch, no pressure. Just a conversation about where you're stuck and whether I can help.
